entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
